en.title: Starfish ID
en.subtitle: Digital Eco-Friendly Business Card Platform
en.description: Built from scratch — a digital business card system with eco-friendly approach, pushing vCards directly to phone contacts.
en.features: Employee dashboard (CRUD, import), bilingual EN/ZH, photo upload, QR code generation.
en.role: Solo full-stack dev + deployment + maintenance + internal coordination.
en.result: Actively used by the company and select clients, replacing paper business cards. Stable in production.

zh.title: Starfish ID
zh.subtitle: 數位環保名片平台
zh.description: 自家從零開發的數位名片系統，eco-friendly 方向，可直推 vCard 到手機聯絡人。
zh.features: 員工後台管理（新增/編輯/搜尋/匯入）、中英雙語、照片上傳、QR code 生成。
zh.role: 獨立全端開發 + 部署 + 維護 + 內部需求協調。
zh.result: 公司內部及部分客戶已在使用，取代紙本名片，穩定運行中。

en.title: Luxury Gateway Ltd
en.subtitle: Premium Limousine Service Website
en.description: High-end limousine service website with booking forms, region-based auto-pricing, and Stripe payments.
en.role: Multiple rounds of client communication, full-stack dev, payment logic, deployment, PM ensuring delivery matches business goals.
en.result: After launch, clients can book and pay online directly — streamlined the entire business workflow.

zh.title: Luxury Gateway Ltd
zh.subtitle: 豪華禮車服務網站
zh.description: 高端禮車服務企業網站，整合預約表單、按地區自動計價、Stripe 支付。
zh.role: 多次跟客戶溝通需求、全端開發、支付邏輯處理、上線維護，當 PM 確保交付 match 業務目標。
zh.result: 網站上線後，客戶可直接線上接單與收款，業務流程順暢許多。

en.title: YATA Official Website + CMS
en.subtitle: 1000+ Content Pages · Custom CMS
en.description: First major project — over 1000+ content pages (recipes, lifestyle guides, product recommendations, eShop links).
en.role: Requirements gathering, custom CMS build, backend management, early bug fixes, SEO optimization, long-term maintenance.
en.result: Client can self-manage content. Website traffic and user experience significantly improved.

zh.title: YATA 一田官方網站 + CMS

zh.role: 從需求溝通、建自訂 CMS、後台管理、修正早期 bug、SEO 優化，到上線後長期維護。
zh.result: 客戶可自行更新內容，網站流量與使用者體驗大幅提升。

en.title: GRAFF Diamonds Internal System
en.subtitle: Repair & Stock Movement Dashboard
en.description: AI-assisted internal system for a luxury jewelry brand — repair request tracking + stock movement dashboard.

en.role: Full-stack dev + AI tool integration (code/logic assistance) + PM coordination with client.
en.result: Improved daily operations efficiency, reduced manual errors and tracking time. Stable in production.

en.title: Booth Design 3D Preview
en.subtitle: Interactive 3D Booth Visualization Tool

en.result: Helped clients/teams quickly visualize booth designs, saving communication costs before physical setup.
